mapper.select: SELECT tbl_goods.gdsNum, tbl_goods.gdsName, tbl_goods.cateCode,goods_category.cateCodeRef,goods_category.cateName ,gdsPrice , gdsStock,gdsDes,gdsImg,gdsDate, tbl_goods.gdsImg, tbl_goods.gdsThumbImg FROM tbl_goods INNER JOIN goods_category ON tbl_goods.cateCode = goods_category.cateCode WHERE tbl_goods.cateCode = #{cateCode}

SELECT tbl_goods.gdsNum, tbl_goods.gdsName, tbl_goods.cateCode,goods_category.cateCodeRef,goods_category.cateName ,gdsPrice , gdsStock,gdsDes,gdsImg,gdsDate, tbl_goods.gdsImg, tbl_goods.gdsThumbImg FROM tbl_goods INNER JOIN goods_category ON tbl_goods.cateCode = goods_category.cateCode WHERE tbl_goods.gdsNum = #{gdsNum}

SELECT tbl_reply.gdsNum, tbl_reply.userId, tbl_reply.repNum, tbl_reply.repCon, tbl_reply.repDate, tbl_member.userName from tbl_reply inner join tbl_member on tbl_reply.userId = tbl_member.userId where gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
